weight: Approx. 17.3 oz. / 492g (Camera only) Approx. 19.0 oz. / 534g (Including the battery and memory card)
focusingrange: Normal: 1.3 ft. (40cm) – infinity (W), 4.3 ft. (1.3m) – infinity (T Auto: 7.9 in. (20cm) – infinity (W), 2.8 ft. (85cm) – infinity (T) Macro: 7.9 in. – 2.3 ft. (20-70cm) (W), 2.8 ft. – 5.2 ft. (85cm – 1.6m) (T)
shootingcapacity: LCD Monitor on: Approx. 250 shots LCD Monitor off: Approx. 700 shots Approx: 310 shots when in Quick Shot mode (LCD monitor on)
computerinterface: Hi-Speed USB 2.0 (Dedicated connector (female) with unified type of digital, audio and video)
lcdmonitor: 3.0-inch TFT color LCD (Vari-angle type with wide-viewing angle)
videoout: Analog: NTSC or PAL, Digital: HDMI (HDMI mini connector)
